profile.name: Jules Sanches
profile.title: Principal Software Engineer | Tech Lead
profile.summary: Experienced leader with 20+ years driving impactful software solutions and fostering innovation. Passionate about team growth, mentorship, and a people-first approach. Beyond work, I volunteer, create music, and compete in padel.

skills: CI/CD, Github, Gitlab, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP (10 years)
Elasticsearch, Redis, Elasticache, RDS, DynamoDB, S3, SQS, SNS (8 years)

education.degree: MS in Computer Science - Machine Learning

projects.name: GenAI API Integration
projects.description: Integrated GenAI APIs from OpenAI, AWS, and GCP using Java and Python, enabling standardized and efficient interactions with multiple providers.
projects.impact: Streamlined API integration, optimized performance and cost, and ensured business alignment with robust middleware.

projects.name: Conversational UI for ETL Pipelines
projects.description: Developed a natural language conversational UI using Generative AI for defining ETL pipelines, automating backend descriptor generation.
projects.impact: Reduced time-to-define ETL pipelines by 40% and improved user satisfaction scores.

projects.name: Visual UI for
projects.description: Designed and maintained scalable backend systems to execute user-defined ETL pipelines integrated with a visual UI.
projects.impact: Enabled real-time monitoring, reduced operational costs by 30%, and ensured industry-standard compliance.

projects.name: Scalable Data Pipeline Solutions
projects.description: Delivered scalable solutions for real-time and batch data processing, integrating advanced storage and analytics platforms.
projects.impact: Reduced data latency by 50%, enabled faster decision-making, and achieved 99.9% uptime.

responsibilities: Led a team of 5 engineers to integrate GenAI APIs.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define API integration requirements.
Designed and implemented middleware for efficient provider interaction.
Introduced automated testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.
Conducted sprint reviews and retrospectives for continuous improvement.
Researched and implemented GenAI techniques for conversational UI.
Developed modular backend systems for adaptable ETL configurations.
Engineered a microservices architecture for scalable ETL execution.
Implemented resource optimization and security protocols.
achievements: Reduced time-to-define ETL pipelines by 40%.
Improved user satisfaction scores with iterative design improvements.
Reduced operational costs by 30% using autoscaling and task scheduling.
Achieved 99.9% uptime for data pipelines.
Reduced data latency by 50%, enabling faster decision-making.

experience.tech_stack: Python, Django, Node.js, Typescript, Angular, React, CSS, HTML, Elasticsearch, AWS EC2, AWS DynamoDB, AWS S3, AWS SQS, AWS SNS, API Gateway, Elastic Load Balancer (ELB), CloudFront, Github, Jest, Mocha, Jasmine, TDD, Docker
